name: Easy-Breezy Guest House
description: A standard two-story cottage in "Easybreeze Holiday Resort," featuring a cat-eared rooftop that expands interior space while shielding from wind and rain â€” an ingenious dual function. Compared to other resort structures, it occupies a smaller space, has lower construction costs, and boasts an endearing appearance, making it ideal both as private housing or as a guest lodge.
